short_summary: The Financial Consumer Agency of Canada (FCAC).
description: The requirement is for the procurement of 2.5 Business Process Consultant for the Financial Consumer Agency of Canada (FCAC) on an as-needed basis to conduct and provide professional internal audit advisory services to support management in its IRM implementation efforts. The services of the Contractor will be required for a period of approximately twelve (12) months commencing on or about January 3, 2022. The expected completion date of this project is no later than December 29, 2023.
full_summary:
### TSPS Services for Business Process Consultant to Financial Consumer Agency of Canada

#### Request for Proposal

**Request Number:** 20221764
**Publication Date:** November 30, 2022
**Closing Date:** December 16, 2022 (Expired)

The Financial Consumer Agency of Canada (FCAC) invites qualified Supply Arrangement Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS/ZT, Tier 1, to submit a proposal for Business Process Consultant services. The selected contractor will provide professional internal audit advisory services to support management in its Information Management (IRM) implementation efforts.

**Background:**

This request is subject to the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) Method of Supply, which undergoes quarterly refresh cycles. To become a qualified Supply Arrangement Holder, interested parties should contact SPTS.TSPS@TPSGC-PWGSC.GC.CA.

**Contract Details:**

*   The expected duration of the contract is approximately 12 months, commencing on January 3, 2022.
*   The expected completion date is no later than December 29, 2023.
*   The estimated level of effort is 50 days.

**Required Qualifications:**

*   Applicants must hold a valid Supply Arrangement under E60ZT-18TSPS/ZT.
*   Their business process consultant services must meet the requirements outlined in the attached document.

**Eligible Contracting Parties:**

*   The following parties have been invited to submit a proposal:
    *   9149481 Canada Inc.
    *   Adirondack Information Management Inc.
    *   Aim Group Inc. in Joint Venture
    *   BRYCA Solutions Inc.
    *   Cyrus Echo Corporation
    *   Durivage Management Solutions Limited
    *   Juno Risk Solutions Incorporated
    *   KORN FERRY (CA) LTD.
    *   KORN FERRY (CA) LTEE
    *   Mobile Resource Group Inc.
    *   Orbis Risk Consulting Inc.
    *   Otus Strategic Financial Business Planning Group
    *   QMR Staffing Solutions Incorporated
    *   The Devon Group Ltd.
    *   The Strategic Review Group Inc.
    *   Vantix Systems Inc.
    *   WindReach Consulting Services Inc.

**Trade Agreements:**

*   This requirement is subject to the provisions of the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Hond
